# Welcome on board, Doctor

We are delighted to see that you want to send your contribution(s) to be merged into this repository.

However, as we are a fairly large team, that means we also put the code quality and review time as our number one priority. In order to save time, I would like you to fill the following "form" to help us triaging more efficently:

## What does this PR do?

- example: [This PR adds my name in `README.md`](https://github.com/expressjs/express/pulls?q=is%3Apr+is%3Aclosed+README)
  - Of all seriousness, **DO NOT** do that.

## Checklist

- [ ] (**REQUIRED**) I have read and understood this statement, to its fullest extent:

> I understand that if my code in this PR is suspected of over-using Generative AI tools (Claude, ChatGPT, Kimi, Grok, ...), to the point that [I do not even comprehend what it writes](https://hackerone.com/reports/2823554), and/or [failed to explain](https://hackerone.com/reports/2871792) what it is, this PR will be declined, and I will be banned from future contributions organization-wide.

- [ ] I have the authority to perform this PR, either on my own behalf or my current employer.

- [ ] I have used appropriate [closing keyword](https://docs.github.com/en/get-started/writing-on-github/working-with-advanced-formatting/using-keywords-in-issues-and-pull-requests#linking-a-pull-request-to-an-issue) for related issues and/or PRs.

- [ ] This PR modifies code file(s).
  - [ ] This PR modifies the CMS.
  - [ ] This PR modifies the API.

- [ ] This PR modifies asset file(s).
  - [ ] This PR modifies localization files.
  - [ ] This PR modifies image files.
